mapper.select: select * from band where name=#{name} and phonenum1=#{phonenum1} and phonenum2=#{phonenum2} and phonenum3=#{phonenum3}
select * from band where name=#{name} and phonenum1=#{phonenum1} and phonenum2=#{phonenum2} and phonenum3=#{phonenum3}
select * from band where id=#{id} and name=#{name}
select * from band where id=#{id} and name=#{name}
